app_description: Translators a professional translation software supports 300 language translation 19 commonly used languages photo translation and voice translation. Translators a simple translation software the whole interface is simple and practical all functions are only for translation. application features universal text translation features automatic recognition Chinese and English transfer and supports 140 language translation. Knowing more will take you further. efficient photo translation photo character recognition and photo album recognition are optional Support 19 commonly used Chinese languages such as China Britain Japan Korea and Thailand take photos one click translation travel reading and foreign language learning and efficiently translate artifacts. intelligent speech translation intelligent speech recognition can better understand the pronunciation habits of Chinese people accurately convert speech into text and translate. real time dialogue translation hold down to speak real time translation speed and accuracy face to face and barrier free communication with foreigners. practical translation collection new words unfamiliar common words classic sentences special tourism terms daily business terms all grouped collection reading and reading anytime and anywhere. Necessary for foreign language learning. English Chinese authoritative dictionary it supports dictionary query on Baidu Jinshan and Bing and is an essential assistant for English learning. about VIP subscription Subscription cycle: 1 month continuous monthly package 12 months year VIP member continuous annual package lifelong member permanent VIP member one time buyout non automatic renewal .
